migrations.description: Add default base to nx.json if its not currently set
migrations.name: set-default-base-if-not-set

migrations.description: Move global settings into nx.json, and project specific settings into workspace.json
migrations.name: 13-0-0-config-locations

migrations.description: Set --parallel=1 for existing repos to preserve the existing behavior
migrations.name: set-parallel-default

migrations.description: @nrwl/workspace:tsc is now @nrwl/js:tsc
migrations.name: 13-3-0-tsc-location

migrations.description: Remove old options that are no longer used
migrations.name: 13-6-0-remove-old-task-runner-options

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/tao with nx
migrations.name: 13-9-0-replace-tao-with-nx

migrations.description: Update the decorate-angular-cli script to require nx instead of @nrwl/cli
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-decorate-cli

migrations.description: Update the tasks runner property to import it from the nx package instead of @nrwl/worksapce
migrations.name: 13-10-0-update-tasks-runner

migrations.description: Changes the presets in nx.json to come from the nx package
migrations.name: 14-0-0-change-nx-json-presets

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-script to nx:run-script
migrations.name: 14-0-0-change-npm-script-executor

migrations.description: Remove Typescript Preprocessor Plugin
migrations.name: remove-typescript-plugin

migrations.description: Support .test. file names in tsconfigs
migrations.name: update-ts-config-for-test-filenames

migrations.description: Create a root babel config file if it doesn't exist and using babel-jest in jest.config.js and add @nrwl/web as needed
migrations.name: add-missing-root-babel-config

migrations.description: Update move jest config files to .ts files.
migrations.name: update-jest-config-extensions

migrations.description: Update to export default in jest config and revert jest.preset.ts to jest.preset.js
migrations.name: update-to-export-default

migrations.description: Add outputs for caching
migrations.name: add-outputs

migrations.description: Remove ESLint parserOptions.project config if no rules requiring type-checking are in use
migrations.name: remove-eslint-project-config-if-no-type-checking-rules-again

migrations.description: Update eslint-rules jest.config.js in order to support ESLint v8 exports mapping, remove category field
migrations.name: eslint-8-updates

migrations.description: Update tsconfig.json to use `jsxImportSource` to support css prop
migrations.name: update-emotion-setup-13.0.0

migrations.description: Migrate Storybook to use webpack 5
migrations.name: migrate-storybook-to-webpack-5-13.0.0

migrations.description: Update to React 18
migrations.name: update-react-18-13.10.0

migrations.description: Update to React DOM render call to React 18 API.
migrations.name: update-react-dom-render-14.0.0

migrations.description: Replace deprecated '@testing-library/react-hook' package with `renderHook` from '@testing-library/react'.
migrations.name: replace-testing-library-react-hook-14.0.0

migrations.description: Add a default development configuration for build and serve targets.
migrations.name: add-default-development-configurations-14.0.0

migrations.description: Removes deprecated node-sass package (sass is already a dependency of @nrwl/web).
migrations.name: remove-node-sass-13-0-0

migrations.description: Remove packages installed by Nx 12's `@nrwl/web:webpack5` generator.
migrations.name: remove-webpack-5-packages

migrations.description: Rename the 'build' executor to 'webpack'
migrations.name: rename-build-to-webpack

migrations.description: Rename the 'package' executor to 'rollup'
migrations.name: rename-package-to-rollup

migrations.description: Add a postcss config option to apps to load a single config file for all libs
migrations.name: add-postcss-config-option
